pkgmetadata.longdescription: pyee====.. image:: https://travis-ci.org/jfhbrook/pyee.png :target: https://travis-ci.org/jfhbrook/pyee.. image:: https://readthedocs.org/projects/pyee/badge/?version=latest :target: https://pyee.readthedocs.iopyee supplies a ``EventEmitter`` object that is similar to the``EventEmitter`` class from Node.js. It also supplies a number of subclasseswith added support for async and threaded programming in python, such asasync/await as seen in python 3.5+.Docs:-----Autogenerated API docs, including basic installation directions and examples,can be found at https://pyee.readthedocs.io .Development:------------See ``DEVELOPMENT.rst``.Changelog:----------See ``CHANGELOG.rst``.Contributors:-------------See ``CONTRIBUTORS.rst``.License:--------MIT/X11, see ``LICENSE``.
